reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Capacity Building for Trade and Export Promotion for Members of HAWASME and Systematic Sustainable Development for HAWASME

description.narrative: The objectives of the project are focused on: (1)supporting small and medium enterprises of the traditional industry villages to export their products, (2)enhancing and improving the capacity of the leaders and the management team of business clubs belongi ng to HAWASME and HAWASME's management board so that they are able to support their members in promoting trade and exports for sustainable development,(3)raising awareness of HAWASME's members in controlling product quality standards for environment protec tion, applying clean technologies producing the goods in compliance with standards for export goods to the North European market, also promoting the cooperation between Finnish and Vietnamese companies in trade promotion experience exchanges business partn erships.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland
